repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:boron 

# Create app directory 
WORKDIR /usr/src/app 

# Install app dependencies 
COPY package.json . 
# For npm@5 or later, copy package-lock.json as well 
# COPY package.json package-lock.json ./ 
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

# Bundle app source 
COPY . . 

EXPOSE 8080 
CMD [ "npm", "start" ]
